doctor.name: Dr. Md. Abu Bakar Siddique
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Abu Bakar Siddique (Dr. AB Siddique) is a Child Specialist in Kushtia. Her qualification is MBBS, DCH, FCPS (CHILD). She is a Associate Professor, Pediatrics at Kushtia Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Abu Bakar Siddique at Sono Diagnostic Center, Kushtia is 3pm to 7pm (Sat to Thu), 8am to 2pm (Fri).
